title: Brand new single storied house in Delkanda,nugegoda
details: Clear title single storied house,3 bedroom,2 bathroom,master bedroom with attachbathroom,fully completed tiled,large living area,pantry cupboard and small pantry cupboard also,car porch,2 or 3 car parking,high parapet walls and sliding gate,water and electricity,8 perch square shape land,price is 185 Lakhs,20 feet wide road,very close to main road delkanda,very easy access to all essential facilities,very easy access to all major cities etc,call Mr Subuhan 0766674618,view prior appointment please.
